install.name: mr.mcs Templateswitcher plugin
install.author: Markus Schmucker
install.description: Switches the template to one of four dependent on device capabilites

param.name: templateLandscape
param.label: Landscape template
param.description: Template for mobile devices where width larger than height

param.name: templatePortrait
param.label: Portrait template
param.description: Template for mobile devices where height larger than width

param.name: templateSmall
param.label: Small template
param.description: Template for mobile devices with small screen where height or width are smaller than the small size value

param.name: smallSize
param.label: Small size
param.description: The maximum size for a small screen

param.name: uaRegex1
param.label: Regex for Client (1)
param.description: Regular expression to test the client's user agent for

param.name: reTemplate1
param.label: Template for Client (1)
param.description: Template to use if the regex matched

param.name: uaRegex2
param.label: Regex for Client (2)
param.description: Regular expression to test the client's user agent for

param.name: reTemplate2
param.label: Template for Client (2)
param.description: Template to use if the regex matched

param.name: uaRegex3
param.label: Regex for Client (3)
param.description: Regular expression to test the client's user agent for

param.name: reTemplate3
param.label: Template for Client (3)
param.description: Template to use if the regex matched
